metadata.synopsis: Drider arrives to the toll house and tells everyone to stay close to him.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Follow the caravan and let the Drider reach S_SCL_Drider_ADAtTollHouse trigger (-78; 21; -75).

1.speaker: Kar'niss
1.text: Stay close. The shadows are darkest here - hungriest here.
1.context: NodeContext: Warning the others in your caravan - you're entering a very dangerous area.
